content.raw:
Shame, seems it's not robust to different platforms. I guess I'll have to get testing set up on OS X sometime soon.
Maybe CMake doesn't yet completely support GET_PREREQUISITES properly on OS X, meaning, sadly, that it's useless.
In any case, this PR is not very critical, everything works fine as long as the libqwt-qt5-dev package is installed. It was just a source of confusion I thought I'd try to address, but maybe not worth the trouble.  Thanks for testing!
content.html: Shame, seems it's not robust to different platforms. I guess I'll have to get testing set up on OS X sometime soon. Maybe CMake doesn't yet completely support GET_PREREQUISITES properly on OS X, meaning, sadly, that it's useless. In any case, this PR is not very critical, everything works fine as long as the libqwt-qt5-dev package is installed. It was just a source of confusion I thought I'd try to address, but maybe not worth the trouble. Thanks for testing!
